Description.Name: Devin Chaste
Description.Details: Sargeant Devin Chaste, callsign "Bugaboo" woke up one day in his barracks and realized he had grown weary of leading brash, young mechwarriors to their doom under the uncaring gaze of his commanding officer in the Steiner army. After finally receiving his discharge paperwork for a decorated career in service, he used his connections, along with his pension, to escape into mercenary life. Bugaboo has since proven himself a respectable addition to any mercenary company looking for a lance leader capable of coordinating tactical alpha strikes to the his employer's enemies. Can Command Tanks and Pilot Mechs.
